title: Spellchecker failure since version 95 (RLBox problem ?)
content:
Since the 95th version, the spellchecker instantly stops working after the first page load, and it never starts again. I have to restart Firefox.

Details:

I have a div element with multiple paragraphs inside. The div has the following attributes: spellcheck="true" lang="hu" contenteditable="true" (I have the same results with lang="en")

After the page load, spelling errors are visible (red wavy underline), but if I edit one of the paragraphs with an error, the underlines are disappear in that paragraph. If I reload the page, the spelling errors are now completely missing. Only browser restart helps, but it only shows the errors again once.

This worked before nicely.

Is there any log I could check?

Versions:

Firefox: 95.0.2 (64-bit) I have reinstalled language packs and dictionaries with the newest versions.
creator: zedas74

title: Certificate error
content: Recently I started getting an error saying SEC_ERROR_REVOKED_CERTIFICATE while trying to open a website. That particular site can only be accessed through my demat account so replicating my situation is not possible. Other browsers like Chrome, Edge are able to open it but Firefox cant, it does only when OCSP is disabled. I reinstalled the browser but the problem remains. Pls tell me how to add that website to exception if its possible or delete all the certificates currently loaded on Firefox or a full reset of the browser removing all previous data. And is it okay if I keep OCSP off all the time?
creator: dheeraj.murthy

title: Fitrefox Toolbar
content:
Hi!

Firefox - Great browser!

You should allow creating small icons for most used websites and be able to place it on the Toolbar.

In past there was an add on available but it was removed.

Or if there is an easy way to make such icons that when clicked opens the website.

Thank you so much.

Best

Ravi
creator: rsachde

title: Retrieve Bookmarks
content: My Mac died and so I could not transfer anything to my new Mac. I have signed back into Firefox. Can I retrieve my old bookmarks? I have tried "Restore" buttons and I have tried "Import". Import takes me to safari where I didn't have any bookmarks.
creator: aboyle

title: Extensions not working
content:
Hi Mozilla Community,

As of a couple of days ago, I've had trouble with my Firefox Extensions. The most apparent one being ads appearing on the sites I browse (I have the Adblock extension installed and active). The extension that reveals the "dislike" ratio on Youtube only works if I disable and then enable the extension, for each video I watch. My entire extensions toolbar seems faulty as well.

I've attached images to illustrate: - Rakuten just appears as a blank box upon clicking it - Video downloader extensions just appear as a white line (doesn't open at all) - Bitwarden (password manager) says "not available in private mode", even though I'm not using a private window

Any help would be greatly appreciated. Thanks, Matt
creator: mattam53

title: Can't switch google account
content: i want to switch between 2 different google account but every time i clicked the "switch account button" it will return back to google main page. Is there another way to switch account?
